changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE mocks ( mock_id UUID NOT NULL, route VARCHAR(2048) NOT NULL, method_id INT NOT NULL, response_content_type_id INT NOT NULL, status_code INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 200, query_params VARCHAR(1024), textual_response_id INT, binary_response_id INT, description VARCHAR(255), created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP, deleted_at TIMESTAMP, entity_status_id INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (mock_id), CONSTRAINT http_method_fk FOREIGN KEY (method_id) REFERENCES http_methods (id), CONSTRAINT response_content_type_fk FOREIGN KEY (response_content_type_id) REFERENCES response_content_types (id), CONSTRAINT textual_response_fk FOREIGN KEY (textual_response_id) REFERENCES textual_responses (id), CONSTRAINT binary_response_fk FOREIGN KEY (binary_response_id) REFERENCES binary_responses (id), CONSTRAINT entity_status_fk FOREIGN KEY (entity_status_id) REFERENCES entity_status (id) );
